title: City Seasons Hotels offer incredible Summer packages
text:
City Seasons Hotels offer incredible Summer packages City Seasons Hotels offer incredible Summer packages Details Category: Abu Dhabi Created on Tuesday, 21 July 2015 09:30 City Seasons Hotels of which the luxurious palace-like Royal Rose Abu Dhabi have launched family packages from as little as AED 325 per person. Offers include Room and Breakfast as well as complimentary entry to Theme Parks. Benefits include free wifi as well as discount on spa treatments and restaurants bills. 
Royal Rose offers Deluxe Room stay as well as entrance to Ferrari Park or Yas Waterworld from AED 849 per couple. The package includes complimentary breakfast, transfer to park and late checkout. An upgrade to the upper room category is also a possibility. City Seasons Dubai Hotel and City Seasons Suites have great packages starting from AED 325 per night for a family of four, rates include breakfast. City Seasons Al Hamra Abu Dhabi offers free entry to their private beach on Saadiyat Island as well as the transfer to and back within their family package from AED 649. City Seasons Al Ain gives the option to visit Al Ain Zoo or Wadi Adventure Park with a Full Board family package -for a family of four persons, minimum stay 2 nights- from AED 888. City Seasons Muscat is a great weekend away stay with and offer starting from AED 600, on half board, late checkout, and Health Club benefits and discount. “This Summer we have gone the extra mile to ensure family stays are perfectly affordable while being comfortable and friendly. With our central location in every city, we know our guests enjoy the Summer activities, shopping, beach or any other festival with no hassle of getting there! said Elise Talj, Group Director of Marketing & Brand Development at City Seasons Hotels. “With Eid we have seen an increased activity compared to the month of Ramadan; the books show a better season for the weeks ahead including August. Abu Dhabi looks better than the other cities maybe because of the vicinity of the place and also for all the attractions that the Emirate has to offer combined with the opening of the new Asian markets,’ she added. All properties are centrally located and enjoy a friendly and comfortable feel, with facilities for families with young children. Highly committed to customer service and attention to detail, City Seasons Hotels have already built a strong reputation amongst international travelers and mainly visitors from GCC countries who enjoy the family atmosphere of the Hotels and Suites as well as their prime location in the heart of the city.
